title: Bug 16938DCR: Class File Editor should scroll more naturally
description: 20020521 (F1)(This may not be a debug PRI wasn't sure). So the workaround, if the user wants to scroll through the Class File editor, is to always use the thumb.
OB: The Class File Editor does not scroll smoothly or naturally.
EB: The Class File Editor should scroll one line at a time when the arrows are clicked or when the scrollbar's background is clicked to scroll a page at a time.
SR: To reproduce the issue, open the Class File Editor and try to scroll using the arrows or by clicking on the scrollbar's background.
